Name: Fifty.ServerAdmin [FSA]
Description:
Part of FSU [ Fifty Server Utilities ]
Implements voting functionality

Dependencies:
  - Northstar
  - Fifty.ServerUtilities
  - Fifty.ServerChatCommands

ConVars.Name: FSA_PREFIX_OWNERS_IN_CHAT
ConVars.Description: Whether UIDs in FSA_OWNERS should have the [OWNER] prefix in chat.

ConVars.Name: FSA_OWNERS
ConVars.Description: A list of owner UIDs separated by ','.

ConVars.Name: FSA_PREFIX_ADMINS_IN_CHAT
ConVars.Description: Whether admins get [ADMIN] prefixed in chat. ( may require them to first login )

ConVars.Name: FSA_ADMINS_REQUIRE_LOGIN
ConVars.Description: Whether admins need to login to use admin only features.

ConVars.Name: FSA_ADMIN_UIDS
ConVars.Description: A list of admin UIDs separated by ','.

ConVars.Name: FSA_ADMIN_PASSWORDS
ConVars.Description: A list of admin passwords separated by ','.
